personal.name: Marcux
personal.title: Aspiring Software Engineer
personal.subtitle: Passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems.
bio: I'm pursuing a Diploma in Business and Financial Technology at Nanyang Polytechnic, developing expertise in full-stack development, database management, and software engineering. Currently working as a Software Engineer (SRE) Intern at DBS Bank, where I build applications that automate workflows and integrate LLMs using Angular, Python FastAPI, and MariaDB.

I'm passionate about creating efficient, scalable systems that solve real-world problems. My experience as a Barista at Starbucks has strengthened my ability to work in fast-paced environments and collaborate effectively with teams.

education.degree: Diploma in Business and Financial Technology

responsibilities: Built applications to automate workflows and integrate LLMs, streamlining processes and improving operational efficiency
Developed full-stack applications using Angular, Python FastAPI and MariaDB

Designed and optimized RESTful APIs for reliable data handling, simultaneously enhancing UI components and implementing component-based architecture principles to deliver cohesive, end-to-end features
Learn about coffee, improve on customer service skills, build up time management skills etc.

projects.title: WealthPilot
projects.description: An AI-powered wealth management platform using Python FastAPI, React Vite, MySQL, and Google Gemini AI with real-time client analysis, product catalog, and historical tracking capabilities.
features: Developed RESTful APIs with SQLAlchemy ORM for client/product management
AI analysis endpoints with system prompt templates for regulatory compliance
Real-time client analysis and product recommendations

projects.title: To-Do App
projects.description: A full-stack task management application using Python FastAPI, React, MySQL, and WebSocket integration with real-time collaboration, workspace organization, and comprehensive task tracking capabilities.
features: Implemented RESTful APIs with SQLAlchemy ORM for task/workspace management
JWT authentication for secure access control
Nested sub-tasks, comment threading, and role-based access control

certifications.title: Soft Skills in IT
certifications.description: Gained key soft skills for IT fields, such as clear communication, teamwork, problem-solving, negotiation, and self-awareness. Understood their role in influencing others, building relationships, and career growth and the benefits such as adaptability, productivity, trust, and organizational skills.

certifications.title: Literacy in AI
certifications.description: Acquired foundational knowledge of Artificial Intelligence, including its concepts, applications, ethical considerations, and key technologies such as machine learning and natural language processing, along with their impact on industries and society.

certifications.title: Foundations of Project Management
certifications.description: Learned the core principles of project management, including planning, scheduling, risk management, and stakeholder communication. Gained practical knowledge of project life cycles and tools for effective team collaboration.
